backend/main.mo: Actor backend defining roles, user profiles, student applications, announcements, homework, routines, class times, locks, and admin-protected authorization helpers with in-memory Map stores.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/UX upgrade features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend fileâ€™s functionality across routing, auth, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH theme tokens, light/dark variables, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration with role-based redirects, layouts, and protected routes for all pages.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Auth context managing session role, username, login/logout logic, and cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: LocalStorage-backed utilities for saving, loading, and clearing typed session data.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main application layout with navigation, mobile menu, user greeting, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthFormFie: Reusable styled form field with label, input, validation error display, and optional icons.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPrimary: Styled primary button for auth screens with loading state and color variants.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthScreenL: Centered layout wrapper for authentication screens with decorative background elements.
frontend/src/components/LockIndicator.ts: Displays a lock or unlock icon with a tooltip indicating lock status.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: UI fallback shown on runtime errors with reload option and optional error details in development.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login flow, and stored identity handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocks.ts: Provides lock state queries and mutations for master, section, and item-level content locks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for student login, applications, announcements, homework, routines, class times, and admin actions like approval and role changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and animations for auth screens and decorative UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard showing applications, students, content sections, and lock controls with mutation handlers for administrative actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders the admin login screen using a hardcoded password and navigates to the home page on success.
frontend/src/pages/ClassRoutinePage.tsx: Displays the latest weekly class routine with a lock indicator and table layout for periods and subjects.
frontend/src/pages/ClassTimeSchedulePage: Manages class time schedules with add, edit, and delete dialogs, grouped by weekday and respecting section and item locks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing role info, quick links, recent announcements, today's routine, and admin controls with lock status.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkPage.tsx: Page to list, add, edit, and delete homework with section and item locking and form dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: CRUD interface for announcements with section/item locks and sortable notice cards.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Displays a pending-approval message for users awaiting admin review with option to logout.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Landing screen letting users choose Student, Visitor, or Admin roles for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StudentApplyPage.tsx: Student application form handling submission, validation, login-as-pending, and success screen.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLoginPage.tsx: Student login form that authenticates via a student login mutation, handles role mapping, and navigates based on approval state.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorLoginPage.tsx: Simple visitor login page that checks a fixed password and logs the user in as a visitor.
frontend/src/utils/adminErrors.ts: Utility functions to extract readable error messages and detect authorization-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for the school website app.
